name: Ali Baba (Suzy Soft)
overview: Ali Baba by Suzy Soft on the Commodore 64 is Pac-Man style maze game from Croatia. Created by Mario Mandic & Zoran Haustic, in this game the baddies steal the cash bags and take them to the top of the screen. You must touch\grab them to take the cash bags away from them. Cash bags that get to the top will stay there in later levels until all 10 top sections are full, at that point the game is over. You can also drop the wall to temporarily block the bad guys. You can stop all the baddies except the red one, who is the heavy, and he can withstand you.
